name: Dilemma Lite
author: Epic Plugins

sections.description:
The Ultimate Yes / No Plugin for WordPress

That’s right ‚Äì you can now get a Lite version of the best-selling Dilemma Plugin for Free!
It‚Äôs not quite as feature packed as Dilemma Pro but it‚Äôs still kick ass. If you are looking to test out Dilemma or your on a small (or zero) budget you can get a copy here, just click the red “Download Version 1.1‚Äù button above.

The Pro Plugin comes with

  • Happier users!
  • An amazing Epic Plugin
  • The Best Yes / No Plugin available

Killer features of Dilemma

  • Random Dilemmas [dilemmas]
  • Red, Blue, Green, Silver style options
  • Image Dilemmas Pro
  • Front End Uploading Pro
  • Widgets Pro
sections.installation: Download and Activate, then start adding Dilemmas üôÇ
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

Download and Activate, then start adding Dilemmas üôÇ

I get 404 not found when I view a dilemma

Try refreshing your permalinks, this may fix the problem. Go to ‘Settings’ -> ‘Permalinks’ and set to default and save, then save them back to your original setting. Then try viewing the Dilemma again.

What are the short codes

The shortcodes are described in the documentation and can be viewed here http://dilemmaplugin.com/shortcodes/

short_description: The plugin can help you understand what, out of two options, your website users prefer. This is a good way to implement A/B testing
